summary: The document appears to be a signature card related to a trust account held by Deutsche Bank, involving individuals such as Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn. It includes details about account types and signatures required, but lacks substantial context regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is listed as an account holder on the Deutsche Bank trust account documentation.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as a signatory on the Deutsche Bank trust account documentation.

keyFacts: The document is a signature card for a trust account at Deutsche Bank.
Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn are named as individuals associated with the account.
The document includes references to account types and signature requirements.
There are indications of a Power of Attorney related to the account.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
